actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to increase the appropriations ceiling for development of Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial, Ohio.

summary.text: Raises the authorization of appropriations ceiling for development of Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial, Ohio from $5,177,000 to $9,327,000.

titles.title: A bill to increase the appropriations ceiling for development of Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial, Ohio.
